StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCandidateAddressByNWAID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT CA.ADDRESS_TYPE, CA.STREET_ADDRESS, CA.CITY_CODE, CA.COUNTY_CODE, CA.STATE_CODE, CA.ZIPCODE FROM CANDIDATE_ADDRESS CA INNER JOIN NWA ON CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = NWA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE NWA.NWA_ID = @NWAID ORDER BY ADDRESS_TYPE
